languages.name: Chief Miner
lines: What brings you on our humble island ? Interested in trading something against typhoon rock ?
*He listens to you, and his welcoming tone fades away
Oh. Up north you say ? You must talk about these fools, perched on their peak.
Good luck then. I’ ve never come across people so stubborn and short minded.
They are out of reality, if you ask me.
Anyway. We’ve had this... thing. Looks like it comes from there. You’ ll certainly find a use for it.
There's a strange rock to the east. You might want to begin there.
